objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Rose Gold Plated
• Crystal Embellished
• Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner is a visually elegant promotional design for a jewelry product, featuring a soft and feminine aesthetic. The layout is divided into four quadrants with subtle geometric segmentation, enhancing visual interest while keeping the focus centralized. The background combines gentle hues with decorative swirls, dotted accents, and translucent circles for added texture. Central to the layout is a product image of rose gold earrings, prominently displayed towards the center-bottom area. Above it, a bold heading (`heading`) captures attention, supported by a serif-style subheading (`subheading`). Below the product, a text block (`description`) lists key features, a strong price label (`price`), and a contrasting call-to-action button consisting of a background rectangle (`cta_background`) and a centered label (`cta`). A stylish, italicized tagline (`tagline`) animates the theme just under the subheading. Fonts vary in style to create hierarchy and elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#D25F70`
- Deep Rose: `#C34A5C`
- Dusty Plum: `#963D4A`
- Light Peach: `#FFE4D6`
- Blush Pink: `#FFF0F0`
- Soft Coral: `#FFDFDF`
- Warm White: `#FFF6F6`
- Accent Pink: `#E5929D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features an elegant and feminine color palette centered around blush pink and sparkling white. The blush pink (#F7A7A3) forms the main body of the earrings, giving the design a soft, romantic appeal. Accents of rose gold (#E38A83) are used to outline and frame different elements, blending smoothly with the pink to add depth. Brilliant white stones (#FFFFFF) and clear diamond-like gems (#E5E5E5) are strategically placed to catch light, enhancing the overall sparkle and elegance. Together, these colors are harmoniously blended to create contrast and visual interest, perfect for a high-end, graceful jewelry advertisement banner.
